attributes.description:
At WINGFIELD MOTORS our customer is king!
Before delivery, this vehicle will receive a Multi-point quality inspection before being subjected to an AA DEKRA roadworthiness test.  We will trade in any vehicle on this transaction and ensure you receive a pleasant buying experience.  Finance and Insurance can be arranged from our premises by our highly qualified and experienced staff.  You can be assured of great aftersales service, should this be required.  This vehicle can be delivered country wide at an agreed cost.  Please ask about our optional Mechanical breakdown warranties for your new vehicle.  We also provide optional Service Plans to ensure you do not experience sudden servicing costs.

attributes.description:
Lindsay Saker has always been a part of your neighbourhood and a part of your life. We are South Africa's biggest Volkswagen, Audi, Select and Commercial vehicle dealer network.When you buy a Volkswagen, you know you are getting so much more than just a car. After Sales Service and support is the next stage in your journey. We are a committed dealer with world-class experts to ensure that you and your Volkswagen are always taken care of. We at Lindsay Saker Vereeniging is your dealer. 

VSP IS ACTIVE FROM 2020/11/25 TILL 2025/11/25 OR 90000 KM		
WARRANTY IS ACTIVE FROM 2020/11/25 TILL 2023/11/25 OR 120000 KM

attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.

attributes.description:
The Kona is an interesting offering from Hyundai, aimed at a youthful, nonconformist target, and is an honest, colourful and desirable vehicle which is far more interesting than equivalent crossover SUVs. The Kona carries forward Hyundai's undeniable reputation for reliability, and an extensive list of standard features to keep one entertained. Safety is also no compromise, as the Kona is equipped with all the passive and active safety measures for added peace of mind to your driving experience. 

Balance of Hyundai’s unrivalled warranty of 7 years / 200’000Km, and a 5 year / 90’000Km service plan.  

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.
